description: head and shoulders of a man with his hand on his forehead; his hand is partially covered by his hair; his hand covers his eye on the left and all but a portion of his closed eye on the right; the fingers and top of his hand have squiggly lines on them and the bottom of his nose that is not covered by his hand has thick black lines running vertically down it
inscription: URC in plate in reverse: Walter 27 | LL of sheet, in pencil: I. Zustand. Probedruck 1.
signed: LR in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté / 27
title: Self. Head in Hand
